title.rendered: Troublemaker 5 Pack + 5 FREE Rudegirl Feminized Seeds

content.rendered:
Troublemaker: The Ultimate Indica Hybrid Experience

Genetic Lineage: Dirty Cash x Triple Kush

Description:

Unleash your daring side with Troublemaker, the newest masterpiece in cannabis genetics. Born from the prestigious cross of Dirty Cash and Triple Kush, this Indica Hybrid is designed for the cannabis connoisseur who seeks both quality and potency.

Flavour & Aroma:

Inhale deeply and discover a complex aroma, dominated by a symphony of sour berries. The taste is an unforgettable experience — a delicious blend of tartness and sweetness that lingers on the palate, leaving you craving more.

Potency:

With a staggering 27% THC content, Troublemaker delivers on its promise of powerful effects. This strain is not for the faint-hearted but offers an exceptional experience for those seeking to push the boundaries of their senses.

Effects:

Troublemaker induces a euphoric high that uplifts the mind and engages the soul. While its Indica roots offer deep physical relaxation, the hybrid nature ensures a balanced, uplifting journey that makes it the perfect choice for any occasion—whether you’re looking to unwind after a long day or seeking inspiration for your next creative endeavour.

Flowering Time:

Patience is a virtue with Troublemaker. Allow for a full 8 weeks or more for flowering to experience the best this strain has to offer. Your reward will be a bountiful harvest of some of the most potent and aromatic buds you’ve ever encountered.

Cultivation:

Ideal for both indoor and outdoor cultivation, Troublemaker is a resilient and rewarding strain for growers at all experience levels. Its robust genetic lineage ensures a hardy plant capable of resisting common pests and diseases.

🎁 Special Bonus: Rudegirl Feminized Seeds

As an added value to your purchase, each Troublemaker seed pack comes with 5 FREE Rudegirl Feminized Seeds.

Rudegirl Features:

  • Genetic Lineage: Godfather OG x Troublemaker
  • THC Content: A Mind-Blowing 35%
  • Type: Indica Hybrid
  • Flavour Profile: Invigorating Notes of Fruity Skunk
  • Effects: Powerful & Relaxing
  • Flowering Time: 8 Weeks+

Indulge in the exquisite potency and complexity of Rudegirl. With a THC content that reaches a breath-taking 35%, this strain is a true powerhouse. The flavours burst with notes of fruity skunk, and its effects are profoundly relaxing—making it the ideal complement to your Troublemaker experience.

 

Disclaimer

Buying, selling, or trading feminized cannabis seeds in the UK is legally permissible, regardless of whether seeds are obtained domestically or from other European countries. However, it is your responsibility to research and comply with local laws and regulations before placing an order. All Tastebudz seeds sold as souvenirs only in full alignment wit UK laws.

Troublemaker is more than a strain; it’s a lifestyle. For those who dare to stand out, who revel in authenticity, and who seek unparalleled quality—your search ends here.
